mapper.select: select (select count(*) from md_task where is_deleted = 0) as taskCount, (select count(*) from md_task where is_deleted = 0 and task_status = ${@org.springblade.common.constant.MdConstant@TASK_STATUS_RUNNING}) as runningCount, (select count(*) from md_task where is_deleted = 0 and task_status = ${@org.springblade.common.constant.MdConstant@TASK_STATUS_FAILED}) as failedCount, (select count(*) from md_task where is_deleted = 0 and task_status = ${@org.springblade.common.constant.MdConstant@TASK_STATUS_STOPPED}) as stoppedCount
